name: mfe-demo
description: Micro Frontend Demo with React and Vue

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd host && npm install && cd ../remote1 && npm install && cd ../remote2 && npm install
scripts.build:remotes: cd remote1 && npm run build && cd ../remote2 && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently -n host,remote1,remote2 -c blue,green,yellow "npm run dev:host" "npm run preview:remote1" "npm run preview:remote2"
